title: Google Maps is reportedly the next target of US antitrust investigations
content:
Google has faced several antitrust lawsuits over the past few years over the dominance of Google Search, ads, and its control over the Android platform. Now, it appears that Google Maps is an upcoming target of antitrust action in the United States.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Maps is reportedly the next target of US antitrust investigations appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: According to a new report, Google Maps may be the next target of US antitrust investigations for anti-competitive behavior.
